nodes.text: there seems to be no monsters on this floor, maybe i could rest for a while
im feeling a bit thirsty, but all i have on me right now is some unclean water
that was some nasty water... i think im going to be sick
maybe i can try filtering the water
but i am feeling really thirsty, i might die of thirst
i remember learning how to make a filter in school. lets see if i can still remember how to make it
